code:
from fastapi import FastAPI, APIRouter
from fastapi.openapi import OpenAPI
from fastapi.openapi.utils import get_openapi
from fastapi.responses import JSONResponse
from fastapi.requests import Request
from fastapi.security import OAuth2PasswordBearer
from fastapi.security import OAuth2PasswordRequestForm
from fastapi.security import Security
from fastapi.security import HTTPBearer
from fastapi.security import SecurityScopes
from fastapi.security import SecurityScheme
from fastapi.security import OAuth2PasswordBearer

app = FastAPI()
openapi_schema = get_openapi(
    title="My App",
    description="My App",
    version="1.0.0",
    routes=app.routes,
)

@app.get("/items/{item_id}")
async def read_items(item_id: int):
    return {"item_name": "Item {}".format(item_id)}

@app.get("/users/{user_id}")
async def read_users(user_id: int):
    return {"user_name": "User {}".format(user_id)}

@app.get("/openapi.json")
async def read_openapi():
    return JSONResponse(content=openapi_schema.json(), media_type="application/json")
prompt: FastAPI ile automatic OpenAPI documentation özelleştir.
